Does anyone know what is needed to activate Sketch and Toon?
.... :\ sketch and toon should be there as its installed with studio...

First and foremost, this is an excellent torrent.

Sure, Sketch and Toon does not load as a default but that does not alter the fact that this is an excellent torrent but since we're on the subject:
 - Sketch and Toon should be a render option within Cinema 4D.
 - It's normally found under "Render" - "Edit Render Settings..." and then under "Stereoscopic" to the left but that's somehow not the case with this torrent.

As far as I'm concerned it's not at all a big deal for a very high quality freebie like this. Thing is that the functionlity of Sketch and Toon is there (check "C:\Program Files\MAXON\CINEMA 4D R13\modules\sketch" and load "defaults.c4d") so if someone knows how to activate it as a default to be available for any project, please get back here. It would really be an extra bonus.
